languages.text: If the target of this attack fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, the attack will also inflict {g|f:1711d1c36c8f40a9a8cb557515d0f31f}exhaustion{/g}.

traits.locale_text: If a target of this character's ranged attack fails a Toughness resistance test with a −10 penalty, that attack has the effect of Merciless Verdict.
If a target of this character's ranged attack fails a Toughness resistance test with a −10 penalty, that attack has the effect of Merciless Verdict.
If a target of this character's ranged attack fails a Toughness resistance test with a −10 penalty, that attack has the effect of {g|f:1711d1c36c8f40a9a8cb557515d0f31f}Exhaustion{/g}.
If the target of this attack fails a Toughness resistance test with a −10 penalty, the attack will also inflict {g|f:1711d1c36c8f40a9a8cb557515d0f31f}exhaustion{/g}.

If the target of this attack fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, the attack will also inflict {g|f:1711d1c36c8f40a9a8cb557515d0f31f}exhaustion{/g}.

languages.translation_comment:
DLC-1. Глава II. Локация VoidshipTemple.
Атаки накладывает на цель бафф (TOU Save -10).

languages.text: Si el objetivo de este ataque falla una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10, el ataque también infligirá {g|f:1711d1c36c8f40a9a8cb557515d0f31f}agotamiento{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the target of this attack fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, the attack will also inflict {g|f:1711d1c36c8f40a9a8cb557515d0f31f}exhaustion{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si el objetivo de este ataque falla una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10, el ataque también infligirá {g|f:1711d1c36c8f40a9a8cb557515d0f31f}agotamiento{/g}.

languages.text: この攻撃のターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}−10で失敗した場合、この攻撃は{g|f:1711d1c36c8f40a9a8cb557515d0f31f}疲労{/g}も与える。
languages.original_text: If the target of this attack fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, the attack will also inflict {g|f:1711d1c36c8f40a9a8cb557515d0f31f}exhaustion{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この攻撃のターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}−10で失敗した場合、この攻撃は{g|f:1711d1c36c8f40a9a8cb557515d0f31f}疲労{/g}も与える。

languages.text: 被攻击的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若未能通过检定，则会受到{g|f:1711d1c36c8f40a9a8cb557515d0f31f}疲惫不堪{/g}效果影响。
languages.original_text: If the target of this attack fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, the attack will also inflict {g|f:1711d1c36c8f40a9a8cb557515d0f31f}exhaustion{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 被攻击的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若未能通过检定，则会受到{g|f:1711d1c36c8f40a9a8cb557515d0f31f}疲惫不堪{/g}效果影响。

languages.text: Misslingt die {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} des Ziels auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -10, bewirkt der Angriff außerdem {g|f:1711d1c36c8f40a9a8cb557515d0f31f}Erschöpfung{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the target of this attack fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, the attack will also inflict {g|f:1711d1c36c8f40a9a8cb557515d0f31f}exhaustion{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Misslingt die {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} des Ziels auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -10, bewirkt der Angriff außerdem {g|f:1711d1c36c8f40a9a8cb557515d0f31f}Erschöpfung{/g}.

languages.text: La cible de cette attaque doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −10. En cas d'échec, l'attaque inflige également l'effet {g|f:1711d1c36c8f40a9a8cb557515d0f31f}Épuisement{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the target of this attack fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, the attack will also inflict {g|f:1711d1c36c8f40a9a8cb557515d0f31f}exhaustion{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La cible de cette attaque doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −10. En cas d'échec, l'attaque inflige également l'effet {g|f:1711d1c36c8f40a9a8cb557515d0f31f}Épuisement{/g}.

languages.text: Цель этой атаки совершает проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −10 и в случае провала получает эффект {g|f:1711d1c36c8f40a9a8cb557515d0f31f}истощение{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the target of this attack fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, the attack will also inflict {g|f:1711d1c36c8f40a9a8cb557515d0f31f}exhaustion{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Цель этой атаки совершает проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −10 и в случае провала получает эффект {g|f:1711d1c36c8f40a9a8cb557515d0f31f}истощение{/g}.

Цель этой атаки совершает проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −10 и в случае провала получает эффект {g|f:1711d1c36c8f40a9a8cb557515d0f31f}истощение{/g}.
